getKey(address).details: getKey Retrieves the public key for the given address.

returns.pubKey: - ABI encoded public key retrieved from storage

mapKey(bytes).details: mapKey Calculates the address for a public key, then saves the mapping from address to public key.

mapKey(bytes32,bytes32).details: mapKey Calculates the address for a public key, then saves the mapping from address to public key.

params.slice0: - first 32 bytes of the public key
params.slice1: - second 32 bytes of the public key

devdoc.title: KeyMap This contracts maps addresses to public keys. Public keys for Secp256k1 are always 64 bytes. To save gas, this contract stores them as an array of two bytes32 words.

getKey(address).notice: Throws an error if the key is not registered.

mapKey(bytes).notice: This overload is somewhat simpler to use, but has a higher calldata cost.

mapKey(bytes32,bytes32).notice: This overload reduces the calldata cost of submission.
